name: Picket Studio
tagline: We engage deeply, strategically and skillfully.
description:
Picket Studio is a Digital Service Design Agency creating world class online services for organisations as serious about user experience as we are. We empower you to operate on the web, not just market on it.
We create world class online services for organisations as serious about user experience as we are. We engage deeply, strategically and skillfully with you and your team to help you master the digital economy, understand change and deliver what users expect.
